description:
The beauty of a soft bottle lies in the fact that, once empty, it compacts to the size of a fist. The opening is a standard size, so the Seeker 4L works with other lids. Ideal for carrying extra water on a hike, paddling tour, road trip or anywhere else you need water and carry space is limited.

  • Soft, grippable TPU is RF welded to create leakproof bonds
  • BPA-free, PVC-free and meets or exceeds FDA and EU regulations
  • Lash points make it easy to attach to a pack, kayak deck, or nearly anywhere else you need it
  • Soft bail handle is comfy to carry and doubles as a retention loop when the bottle is rolled up
  • 42mm cap allows you to drink and pour with ease
  • Can be frozen or filled with hot water (max temp 60°C)
name: Hydrapak Seeker Water Container 4L
